title: Selling Old Judges Ewing/Mascott & Billy Hamilton
author: Misunderestimated

posts.post_title: Selling Old Judges Ewing/Mascott & Billy Hamilton
posts.post_content:
Both are low graded by PSA owing to their backs:
HAMILTON is spoken for.... Ewing is-------> on eBay
The front images, as the scans should demonstrate, are very clear. Prices include Registered Mail insured.
Please contact me at [url]bhodes@rcn.com[/url] to purchase (emails to me have priority). The line of light going down the Ewing card is my scanner not the card or the PSA holder.

Paypal is accepted w/out any surcharge.
References available.

posts.post_title: Hamilton reserved -- Ewing & Mascott price lowered

posts.post_content: Thanks Brian......check will be sent Monday !!
